affix.name: affix
affix.description: A component that wrap around another component to make it stick the viewport.

propList.Name: offsetBottom
propList.Description: Offset from the bottom of the viewport (in pixels)

propList.Name: offsetTop
propList.Description: Offset from the top of the viewport (in pixels)

propList.Name: target
propList.Description: Specifies the scrollable area DOM node

propList.Name: onChange
propList.Description: Callback for when Affix state is changed
